Hello there!

My name is Alessandra Gherardelli, I am a tech-savvy professional with 7 years of experience in driving communications and information management projects in international organizations.

Currently I work for the World Food Programme (WFP), the leading humanitarian agency fighting hunger in 80+ countries and recipient of the 2020 Nobel Peace Prize.
